#### <s class="topic-title">[[Midazolam]]</s>

An anticonvulsant and [[Benzodiazepines|benzodiazepine]] [[drugs|drug]] with rapid onset that is commonly used in seizures, [[anesthesia]] and [[anxiety]] disorders.
